page.title: 05Transport in King's Lynn
page.content: {Cars&Bicycles}Most people in the area own one car. There is an average of two cars per family in South Wootton.Many people also use bicycles regularly. {Footpaths}1.Follows a route from the North Lynn industrial estate to the Wootton marshes. 2.Circular route via Old West Sea bank,North Lynn farm,Fisher fleet,behind factories and along river bank to Old Sea bank {Railways}Disused track,Lynn to Hunstanton line. Closed to goods traffic Dec.1964 and to passengers May 1969.Single tracks connect factories in dock area with main line. {River}Ships carrying cargoes of grain,fertilizer,fuels,wood,steel,scra p metal and manufactured goods eg.cars.Fisher fleet operates from Ouse.
